/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings that add to the urban charm of the scene. Cars of different colors are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy nature of the area. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
